tables.base_query: SELECT CAST([ID] AS bigint) AS [ID], CAST([ID_Relatie] AS bigint) AS [ID_Relatie], CAST([ID_Relatie_bron] AS bigint) AS [ID_Relatie_bron], CAST([ID_Relatie_doel] AS bigint) AS [ID_Relatie_doel], CAST([ID_Relatie_nieuw] AS bigint) AS [ID_Relatie_nieuw], CAST([ID_voorgaande_taak] AS bigint) AS [ID_voorgaande_taak], CAST([ID_starttaak] AS bigint) AS [ID_starttaak], CAST([ID_takentemplate] AS bigint) AS [ID_takentemplate], CAST([ID_Product] AS bigint) AS [ID_Product], [LinkTyp] AS [LinkTyp], CAST([ID_GENERIC] AS bigint) AS [ID_GENERIC], CAST([neu] AS bigint) AS [neu], CAST([upd] AS bigint) AS [upd], CAST([Datum_afgehandeld] AS bigint) AS [Datum_afgehandeld], CAST([startdatum] AS bigint) AS [startdatum], CAST([Duur in dagen] AS int) AS [Duur_in_dagen], [betreft] AS [betreft], [Taaksoort] AS [Taaksoort], CAST([taakstatus_code] AS smallint) AS [taakstatus_code], [taakstatus] AS [taakstatus], [Prioriteit] AS [Prioriteit], CAST([ID_aangemaakt_door] AS int) AS [ID_aangemaakt_door], [aangemaakt_door] AS [aangemaakt_door], CAST([ID_Verantwoordelijk] AS int) AS [ID_Verantwoordelijk], [verantwoordelijk] AS [verantwoordelijk], CAST([Tenant] AS int) AS [Tenant], [proces] AS [proces], CAST([einddatum] AS bigint) AS [einddatum] FROM [dbo].[Taken]

tables.name: UBO_Onderzoeken
tables.base_query: SELECT CAST([ID] AS bigint) AS [ID], CAST([ID_Relatie] AS bigint) AS [ID_Relatie], CAST([Extsystem_code] AS int) AS [Extsystem_code], [Extsystem] AS [Extsystem], [Sleutel] AS [Sleutel], [UBO_status] AS [UBO_status], CAST([NEW_DT] AS bigint) AS [NEW_DT], CAST([UPD_DT] AS bigint) AS [UPD_DT], CAST([Datum start VNAB] AS bigint) AS [Datum_start_VNAB], CAST([Tijd start VNAB] AS bigint) AS [Tijd_start_VNAB], CAST([Datum afgerond VNAB] AS bigint) AS [Datum_afgerond_VNAB], CAST([Tijd afgerond VNAB] AS bigint) AS [Tijd_afgerond_VNAB], CAST([UBO verloopt op] AS int) AS [UBO_verloopt_op], [Status VNAB onderzoek] AS [Status_VNAB_onderzoek], CAST([Datum_afgebroken] AS bigint) AS [Datum_afgebroken], CAST([Tijd_afgebroken] AS bigint) AS [Tijd_afgebroken] FROM [dbo].[UBO_Onderzoeken]

tables.name: Verkoopkansen
tables.base_query: SELECT CAST([ID] AS bigint) AS [ID], CAST([id_relatie] AS bigint) AS [id_relatie], CAST([datum_afsluiting] AS int) AS [datum_afsluiting], [status] AS [status], [fase] AS [fase], [sales_fase] AS [sales_fase], [stepid] AS [stepid], CAST([WFT_dossier] AS int) AS [WFT_dossier], [productgroep] AS [productgroep], [product] AS [product], [actie] AS [actie], CAST([campagne_sleutel] AS bigint) AS [campagne_sleutel], [campagne_naam] AS [campagne_naam], [type_business] AS [type_business], [advies_bemiddeling] AS [advies_bemiddeling], CAST([verwachte_ingangsdatum] AS int) AS [verwachte_ingangsdatum], [adviseur] AS [adviseur], [kantoor] AS [kantoor], [binnendienst] AS [binnendienst], CAST([neu] AS bigint) AS [neu], CAST([upd] AS bigint) AS [upd], [reden_omschrijving] AS [reden_omschrijving], CAST([vraag1] AS bit) AS [vraag1], CAST([vraag2] AS bit) AS [vraag2], CAST([vraag3] AS bit) AS [vraag3], CAST([vraag4] AS bit) AS [vraag4], CAST([vraag5] AS bit) AS [vraag5], CAST([vraag6] AS bit) AS [vraag6], CAST([vraag7] AS bit) AS [vraag7], CAST([vraag8] AS bit) AS [vraag8], CAST([vraag9] AS bit) AS [vraag9], CAST([vraag10] AS bit) AS [vraag10], CAST([vraag11] AS bit) AS [vraag11], CAST([mustwin] AS bit) AS [mustwin], CAST([Premie_leenbedrag] AS float) AS [Premie_leenbedrag], CAST([Tekencommissie] AS float) AS [Tekencommissie], CAST([Incassoprovisie] AS float) AS [Incassoprovisie], CAST([Volmacht] AS bit) AS [Volmacht], CAST([Fee_eenmalig] AS float) AS [Fee_eenmalig], CAST([Fee_doorlopend] AS float) AS [Fee_doorlopend], CAST([Gewogen_waarde] AS float) AS [Gewogen_waarde], CAST([negatieve_verkoopkans] AS int) AS [negatieve_verkoopkans], [aangemaakt_door] AS [aangemaakt_door], [Polis] AS [Polis], [Identiteitsbewijs] AS [Identiteitsbewijs], CAST([Inventarisatieformulier advies] AS int) AS [Inventarisatieformulier_advies], CAST([Inventarisatieformulier EO] AS int) AS [Inventarisatieformulier_EO], CAST([Datum aanbiedingsbrief] AS int) AS [Datum_aanbiedingsbrief], [Anders] AS [Anders], [Serviceabonnement] AS [Serviceabonnement], CAST([Begin serviceabonnement] AS int) AS [Begin_serviceabonnement], CAST([Eind serviceabonnement] AS int) AS [Eind_serviceabonnement], CAST([Getekend aanvraagformulier] AS int) AS [Getekend_aanvraagformulier], CAST([Getekend adviesrapport] AS int) AS [Getekend_adviesrapport], [Leadgenerator] AS [Leadgenerator], CAST([Ondersteuning] AS bit) AS [Ondersteuning], CAST([KM_251_statnr] AS bigint) AS [KM_251_statnr], CAST([KM_251_volgnr] AS bigint) AS [KM_251_volgnr], CAST([aanvraag ORV] AS int) AS [aanvraag_ORV], CAST([Financial Planning] AS bit) AS [Financial_Planning], [Resultaat] AS [Resultaat] FROM [dbo].[Verkoopkansen]
